title: Nigeria’s Apex Bank Lifts Ban on Crypto, Issues Fresh Guidelines
description:
The Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) released a circular containing guidelines on virtual assets service providers (VASPs). The circular signaled a shift from the CBN’s original position, which restricted crypto transactions. According to the CBN, Current trends globally have shown that there is a need to regulate VASPs.
